Product Description

A Basic house repair tool kit is essential whether you are doing basic DIY work or working household projects. M MEEPO 186-piece tool set is suitable for most home repair, auto repair and DIY projects. All the tools are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping. 186-piece high quality tool kit includes hammer, flat & phillips screwdriver set, adjustable water pump pliers, tape measure, socket set and socket adapter, screwdriver bit set and holder, Metric allen wrench set, lineman pliers, magnetic level and etc. All tools are made of high quality chrome vanadium steel forged at high temperature, high strength, high hardness, durability, corrosion resistance. This tool set can be used in indoor and outdoor. Suitable for most house maintenance, DIY projects and etc

1-Piece Tool Box (Size: 15x12x3.5 inch )

1-Piece 20oz Hammer with non-slip handle

1-Piece 6 Inch High Leverage Linesman Pliers

1-Piece 8 Inch long nose Pliers

1-Piece 10 inch water pump pliers

1-Set of 9 piece Metric allen wrench set ( size: 1.5/2/2.5/3/4/5/6/8/10 )

1-Piece 1/4inch mini ratchet and 12-piece Metric socket set (size : 13/12/11/10/9/8/7/6/5.5/5/4.5/4mm)

1-Piece 1/4inch mini ratchet extention

5-Piece Precision Slotted and Phillips Screwdriver Set with Rotating Caps

1-Piece screwdriver bit holder and 40-Piece Slotted Phillips Star Bits (size: 3-8/H3-H7/PZ0-PZ3/S1-S3/T8-T40/PH0-PH3)

1-Set of 6 Piece Slotted and Phillips Screwdriver set ( Slotted size: 6*38mm/5*75mm/6*100mm; Phillips size: PH2*38mm/ph1*75mm/ph2*100mm)

1-Piece 9inch Magnetic Level

1-Piece 16Ft/5M Inch Metric Tape Measure

1-Box of Assortments

Tools Includes:

1* 7.5 inch long nose plier

1* 7.1 inch lineman plier

1* 11.5 inch hammer

1* 10 inch water pump plier

1* 9 inch magnetic level

Tools Includes:

1* 3.9 inch flat screwdriver

1* 8.3 inch flat screwdriver

1* 8.3 inch phillips screwdriver

1* 6.7 inch flat screwdriver

44-Piece screwdriver bit & holder

Tools Includes:

5* precision screwdriver set

SAE allen wrench set

1* 5.7 inch ratchet

1* 16-feet/5M tape measure

12-piece drive socket set

1* socket adapter

1-box of screw assortment set

Product Description

Spring Style

✓

✓

With Lines

✓

✓

✓

Size
3X3 INCH 3X3 INCH 3X3 INCH 3X5 INCH

COLORFUL LINED: The new fashion comes with lines, 6 pads, 3×3 inch, 6 different colors with black auxiliary wire transparent clearly visible sticky notes. (300 sheets)
FRIENDLY HELPFUL HINTS: In order to get a better user’s experience, we recommend you to use pencils, ballpoint pens, oil-based markers, （Not recommended to use pens, water-based pens, gel pens, common markers, unless you can wait for handwriting to dry after using water-based pen. Do not wipe handwriting immediately)
EXTENSIVE USE: These new lined transparent sticky notes are popular and can be used for everything from notes, daily home tips, classification management notes pads, study & reading annotating message reminders, research & business meetings memos, and more.
FEATURE OF NOTES：Small and lightweight, you can carry it everywhere. Such as:Universities, offices, schools, libraries, LABS, parties, etc. The black lines help you write neatly and make note-taking look good.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: Made of high transparency & can write PET material allows you to see the text and information on the bottom when pasted on books, notebooks, computers, notes, etc. It’s your work, study and scientific research daily life supplies.

Transparent Sticky Notes Show

SYMDROMIA – All size & more color transparent sticky notes are available by our shop.
